document_data.caption: Sylgar resting under his master.
document_data.name: Sylgar
document_data.race: [[Goldfish]]<ref group="note">The later source ''[[Laeral Silverhand's Explorer's Kit]]'' calls Sylgar a "[[Delimbiyr River|Delimbiyr]] [[carp]]". Whether this is a retcon or the identity of just one of the fish's "incarnations" is unknown. It should be noted that on Earth the [[Wikipedia:goldfish|goldfish]] is a small species of carp, which provides a third possibility, that the Delimbiyr carp is simply a goldfish. In contrast, ''Waterdeep: Dragon Heists'' suggests using the stats of a [[quipper]] for Sylgar.
document_data.mainbody: '''Sylgar''' was the name of the prized pet [[goldfish]] of the [[Xanathar]], [[Zushaxx]]. As of [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} unbeknownst to its owner, the fish had died and been replaced by the members of the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] several times.
document_data.Possessions: Sylgar had two [[fishbowl]]s: a larger one that weighed {{SI|6000|lb|k|long=yes}} and was over {{SI|17|ft|long=yes}} in diameter, and a smaller one used primarily for feeding that weighed {{SI|60|lb|k|long=yes}}.{{Cite adventurers league/Underworld Speculation|10}}
